pitch.cc: That was pitch number 45 for Johan Santana; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .215 average in the first 45 pitches but they hit .261 off him after that.
Johan Santana had Derek Jeter down 0-2 but could not put him away.
